truck.Name: Route 40
truck.Description: Master of the Argentinean asado, Felipe Cufre has a vision to bring the best recipes of his native country to you. Born in Buenos Aires, he spent the last seven years living in Patagonia, the windswept, mountainous, majestic countryside of southern Argentina. Over the past 25 years Felipe has mastered the art of fire- the essence of the asado. Of Argentinean grilling Felipe says, “its simple, when the aroma of asado is in the air, your tastebuds can’t help but take notice.” - See more at: http://www.route40foodtruck.com/about/#sthash.nsUU1Ex3.dpuf

truck.Name: Mikes2kitchen
truck.Description: Mikes² Kitchen prepares express breakfast and lunch favorites, served conveniently and affordably. Our innovative gourmet mobile kitchen provides a unique dining experience; whether you enjoy your meal with us or on the go. Each meal is prepared from scratch and made to order; ensuring the highest quality breakfast and lunch.

truck.Name: Uncle Freds Franks
truck.Description: Uncle Fred’s Franks is a mobile food business delivering hot dogs and sausages to customers seeking fresh-cooked food in an outdoor, on-the-go environment. His mission was simple: Provide you with one of the best hot dogs you have ever eaten.

truck.Name: Taste of phillipines
truck.Description: A Taste of the Philippines' goal is to put the Philippines on the map by sharing some of the culture through Filipino food. We offer some of the classic dishes such as chicken adobo, pancit (vegetarian), bistek Tagalog, manok sa gata, lugaw, kare-kare and ginulayang tofu/manok/shrimp (vegetable stir fry with either tofu, chicken or shrimp. Of course we serve our famous lumpias (beef and vegetarian lumpias available). We also serve turon (fried banana).

truck.Name: Bistro Colorado
truck.Description: We focus on fresh, vibrant dishes in the spring and summer and more hearty fare during the fall and winter months. We feature all natural whole food plant based and allergen friendly options.

truck.Name: Bobs Blazin BBQ
truck.Description: Bobs is a mobile food truck that serves award winning BBQ throughout the Denver Metropolitan area. Come try our delicious BBQ pork sandqiches and award world-famous bbq sauces
